name: Christianmusic
0:
”Alexa, open christian music”
”Alexa, ask christian music for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start christian music”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christian music
des: Listen to christian music in live from Radio Adventiste bethanie. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
